title: The Versatile Blogger Award 🥇 😊
content:
The Versatile Blogger Award is one of the best of the ‘chain letter’ awards out there in the blogosphere. It is a blogger award that recognizes quality of writing, uniqueness of the subjects covered and the quality of the photographs of a blog. Here is the link to the VBA blog – versatilebloggeraward I'm so happy and excited one more Award in a row My blog has been nominated by Binita Bora and thank you so much for nomination. As you go through her blog she covered inspiration quotes, life experiences & mainly giving suggestions on unemployment a lot more info, you should checkout her blog Educatedunemployedindian VBA Rules: If you are nominated, you’ve been awarded the Versatile Blogger award.
  • Thank the person who gave you this award. That’s common courtesy.
  • Include a link to their blog. That’s also common courtesy — if you can figure out how to do it.
  • Next, select 15 blogs/bloggers that you’ve recently discovered or follow regularly. ( I would add, pick blogs or bloggers that are excellent!)
  • Nominate those 15 bloggers for the Versatile Blogger Award — you might include a link to this site.
  • Finally, tell the person who nominated you 7 things about yourself.
Seven Things About Me:
  1. I like to do any work by listening songs (cont.)
  2. I love pet cats 🐱 , tiger 🐯 and lion 🦁 cubs too 😉
  3. Short term memory ☺️ I think you guys don't believe it
  4. Optimistic
  5. As you all know I'm passionate to cook and love to learn more and more
  6. I'm Indian 🇮🇳
  7. I like traveling and exploring new places( it must include zoo ;))
My Nominees: InspiresN Megala's Kitchen Jyolikalwayscravecute Dimplescookbook Surbhikirasoi Surreyfarmsdotnet Savvysouthindian Cookingwithshifa Jyotiskitchen Sneakpeekintomykitchen Cookingwithshifa Foodzesty Anushascuisines Akshayakumbham Shwethamehta I hope you all accept this lovely award and soon i will see your award post and eagerly waiting to read and enjoy your facts..Happy cooking and have a great day :)
